Biography

AT WASHINGTON

2023: Played in five games in 20923 .. .saw his first college action in the UW's season-opening win over Boise State ... made a tackle in the win over Tulsa ... also played in the Huskies' win at Michigan State ... made a tackle in the win over California ... also played in the win at Arizona.

2022: Did not see any game action during the 2022 season.

2021: Enrolled at UW on June 21, for the start of the LEAP summer program for new student-athletes ... did not see any game action during the 2021 season.

HIGH SCHOOL

Played quarterback and defensive end at O'Dea ... helped lead the Irish to a 12-1 record and the 3A state championship game as a junior in 2019 ... as a junior, quarterbacked O'Dea to a regular-season win over defending and eventual state champion Eastside Catholic, breaking the Crusaders' 18-game winning streak ... earned second-team All-Metro League at QB as a junior ... 48-for-82 for 628 yards, 12 touchdowns and just two interceptions while rushing for 466 yards and nine scores in 2019 ... also helped O'Dea to an 11-2 overall record and the 3A state championship game as a sophomore in 2018 ... played football for coach Monte Kohler.
